Hash function: Yes temporary indexes for equality joins
Expression index: Yes for some scalar functions like LOWER and UPPER

R-tree/R-tree: Aria (storage engine) and Aria (storage engine) tables and, since v10.2.2, Aria (storage engine) tables onlyAria (storage engine)
Spatial index: Aria (storage engine) and Aria (storage engine) tables and, since v10.2.2, Aria (storage engine) tables onlyAria (storage engine)

Bitmap index: Bitmap filter index for Star Join Query

Full text search: MyISAM tables[98] and, since v5.6.4, InnoDB tables[99]
Spatial index: MyISAM tables[100] and, since v5.7.5, InnoDB tables[101]

Inverted index: Generalized Inverted Index (page does not exist)
Forest of Trees (page does not exist): Forest of Trees (page does not exist)
